document.full_text: south dakota's governor signed into law on tuesday the longest abortion waiting period in the nation at 72 hours, and opponents immediately promised a legal challenge to stop it from going into effect.
document.title: south dakota law requires 3-day abortion wait
lines_and_colors: south dakota's governor signed into law on tuesday the longest abortion waiting period in the nation at 72 hours, and opponents immediately promised a legal challenge to stop it from going into effect.
